price: 65 « Inutile, aujourd’hui, de crier au secours. Nul ne pourra vous mettre à l’abri de Notre châtiment.
arabic: لَا تَجۡـَٔرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā tajarū al-yawma innakum minnā lā tunṣarūna
